question:
Consider the following statements:
  1. Public Accounts Committee consists of members from both houses of the parliament
  2. Committee on Public Undertakings consists of members of Lok Sabha Only
  3. Estimates Committee consists of members from Rajya Sabha only
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Second statement is incorrect because Committee on Public undertakings consists of members from both houses of the Parliament. Estimates committee consists of members from Lok Sabha only.
